data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix dahurica (Dahurican larch) from sample SHAGUCLA-162

Exposition W, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Hangschutt, Perm. Frost 10c, Tree line 100 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 75%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Betula Lärchenwald, Film number: 978A
